```{asis, echo = {{select_query_knit}}, eval = {{select_query_knit}}, include = {{select_query_knit}}}
Loads the raster image for the area selected on the map
```

```{r, echo = {{select_query_knit}}, include = {{select_query_knit}}}
poly <- matrix({{select_poly}}, ncol = 2, byrow = FALSE)
ras <- select_query(poly, "{{select_date}}")
raster_name <- "{{select_name}}"

raster_extent <- as.vector(terra::ext(ras))
map_pal <- colorBin("Greens", domain = values(ras), bins = 9, na.color = "#00000000")

leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldTopoMap') %>%
  addRasterImage(raster::raster(ras), colors = map_pal) %>%
  addTiles(urlTemplate = "", attribution = "Copernicus Sentinel data 2023") %>%
  fitBounds(lng1 = raster_extent[[1]], lng2 = raster_extent[[2]], lat1 = raster_extent[[3]], lat2 = raster_extent[[4]]) %>%
  addLegend(position = "bottomright", pal = map_pal, values = values(ras),
            title = raster_name) 
```
